attributes.action: Scrap the planned vehicle tracking and road pricing policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The idea of tracking every vehicle at all times is sinister and wrong. Road pricing is already here with the high level of taxation on fuel. The more you travel - the more tax you pay.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
